Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: You can find plenty of tournaments hosted every day on our mobile apps on iOS and Android.  Quote from: TentallyMooN on February 09, 2018, 06:02:44 PM All the same, we are waiting for news, for a long time nothing has been heard from the project and this is misleading us! Clarify the situation  Apologies if you feel misled, we are trying to keep everyone updated and be as transparent as possible during our development. We are currently heavily developing our new website which will allow you to purchase GZR, and more importantly will allow you to actually use your GZR right away to open treasures and start collecting items to build our your blockchain gaming profile! We will be replacing the current https://tokensale.gizer.io with the new site as soon as its ready. We have not announced a date because we are heavily testing and we do not want to delay the project further once we announce a date. You can be sure that when we do announce the date and full timeline, that will be the final date and that is exactly when the tokensale will be happening.   Quote from: aleandromagno on February 10, 2018, 04:40:42 AM Is there any other communication channel where investors can get a full picture of what is happening with the project and his progress?   Best way to stay up to date is to sign up for our newsletter and join telegram. The team is quite active on telegram and happy to answer your questions. To give you a brief overview (although I would highly recommend checking out our medium) we are currently finishing development/testing of our new product (the global gaming identity, built in Unity 3D). We are doing something really intricate by linking up a Unity based game with the Ethereum blockchain -- to our knowledge this has never been done before and we are taking every precaution to ensure that the site will run smoothly and the product is completely in working order before we are willing to announce a final tokensale date. We do not want to delay again once we announce and we want to make sure that our product is completely usable from day 1! We'll do our very best to keep our community up to date with as many updates as we can offer.  We really want to thank each and every one of you for your support and patience. We're extremely excited to show you all what we've built!

Author: wojteks102
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hello Gizer team, Any information about when the main sale is going to start and how long it's going to take?

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hi billykannithi, thank you for your interest in our project and the fact that you believe in it just as much as we do.  It's true that we haven't had an aggressive marketing strategy just yet as I mentioned before in another post. We are still refining the product first and foremost because that is what will guarantee the success on the market. This will make us accomplish our long-term goals, so each and every one of our GZR and platform users can have a great experience and enjoy what we have created.  If you take a look on almost all the ICO review sites we are on, we are among the highest, and at times even the highest rated project. Most other ICO projects are just paying a lot of money to get "positive" reviews, even if that's not the case, and as we have all seen, many have failed to deliver on what they have promised, or even worse, didn't do anything.  This is not our case so you can be confident that Gizer is doing the right things, hence why we do things differently than what you might expect from the average project on the market.  Quote from: wojteks102 on January 25, 2018, 04:31:22 PM Hello Gizer team, Any information about when the main sale is going to start and how long it's going to take? Hi wojteks102, I can't tell you exactly the official starting date but we are aiming for keeping the sale open through the whole month of February. We want to do this to make sure we give everyone enough time to get the chance to buy GZR tokens since we believe this is a great opportunity for anyone who believes in the gaming industry and especially the growth of the eSports scene.

Author: bitgov
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: I think this question has already been asked several times, but we still do not know why there is no answer to it .. When Gizer ICO ends? If there are any reasons why you can not give us accurate answer, can someone explain why? Thank you.

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hello bitgov,  The simple answer is that we can't give an answer of when the ICO ends because at the moment there is not even a fixed date for when the public sale will start. We are working on creating a really solid platform for gamers and we want to take our time in taking the best possible decisions for everyone who is already involved in our project, just as much as everyone who will join at a later stage.  We are not taking the approach many other ICO's have taken, you will see Gizer even 10 years from now, and at a level that no one would even think of at the moment. We are open to sharing many updates at all times. Right now if you check our latest posts on all the social media platforms, we are engaging with the community and showing the work done behind the scene, like the GGiD backgrounds.  Many more updates coming soon. Hope this answers your question for now.

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hello bitgov, to answer your question, we are looking at running the Public Sale before the end of the month but as you might know, there is always the possibility of things not going as planned. Even if there would be any unplanned events that may delay the public sale, we are working hard on always compensating by bringing even more value to the Gizer platform and everyone involved in it.  Quote from: roshanfious on January 14, 2018, 02:16:10 PM Gizer is really an interesting project and you should consider investing in tQhis project. In fact, the idea of the project is very good but there is no good marketing strategy. I think the development team should fix this because marketing plays the most important role for the whole project Hello roshanfious, I can understand your comment, but you have to take into account that you can't do too many things at the same time and expect quality. That is the main reason why we have been focusing on development, making a great product, presenting it to a number of gamers who enjoy specific video games and then iterating on the feedback we have been receiving.  Marketing will be a much higher focus very shortly, but unlike most other products on the market, we want to more importantly focus on having a great product and create a user base of loyal users that enjoy the Gizer platform for its functionalities, practicality and ease of use for having fun.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Sure, i'll try to keep it brief but basically:  ~50% of the budget will go towards platform development. Even though our app is already live, we'll be expanding the development team to further build out the e-commerce marketplace, analytics platform for hosts and services, additional competitive formats (new brackets, new ways to play), advertising/feature options for hosts and services, artificial intelligence, and a full web platform to support non-mobile games as well as create a set of tools for Streamers. Additionally, we'll be moving the marketplace, tournament hosting system, and most importantly GGiD (our universal profile with stat tracking/reputation/avatar system) onto the blockchain. There are a lot more upgrades to come that you can check out on our roadmap, these are just a few. TL;DR -> We're going to use a significant portion of the budget to further develop our apps and create value for our user base to solidify multiple stable revenue streams.  Next, 15% will be allocated to marketing and live events. We have partnered with Tapjoy and Omnia Media and will be engaging in extremely aggressive user acquisition campaigns using popular YouTube influencers from the gaming community. Our team has a lot of experience with this type of user acquisition and we aim to acquire a million users by 2019. This also includes organizing live events and tournaments, we will partner with sponsor organizations like Tapjoy in order to offset costs for these events.    10% goes to compliance and legal. Being in the Blockchain space, this one needs no explanation.  General and Admin - 20% -> This accounts for general day-to-day operations for the company. Expanding our team means we'll need to expand our office. This also will help to cover salaries for support staff, travel, and conferences, among other operational expenses.  Misc: 5% contingency because you can't foresee everything.   Let me know if there's anything else you want to know!

Author: jackandrew
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: After reaching to some posts out there, let me ask you if there is a difference between accredited investors and regular investors. If so, what is it?

Author: j.kerstein
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Accredited investors are generally people with either an annual income of $200,000, or $300,000 for joint income, for the last two years with expectation of earning the same or higher income. An individual must have earned income above the thresholds either alone or with a spouse over the last three years. One can also be considered an accredited investor with a minimum of ~$1,000,000 in personal assets.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: The tokens are distributed immediately, as soon as you send ETH to our smart contract you get GZR sent right to your wallet. If you choose to purchase with BTC there can be up to a 24h delay before GZR is sent to your ETH wallet. We're not allowed to announce exchanges until after the sale, all we can say is that we are already in talks with several exchanges and we will be announcing the exchanges where GZR will be listed after the sale.  Quote from: hirokazu on December 03, 2017, 01:08:22 AM Quote from: clartedscunner on December 02, 2017, 12:55:15 PM Quote from: ggcript on December 02, 2017, 11:52:52 AM Why aren’t you going to burn unsold tokens? In my opinion, it would increase the growth of the value of remaining ones. It will be distributed between the people who bought tokens. So this is like one of the advantages of the buyers. But how the distribution will going on? is it will based percentage of each GZR token owner?    Yes, they will be distributed to token holders pro rata / proportionally after the sale, if there are unsold tokens remaining.

Author: j.kerstein
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: I'm not sure exactly what you mean by "tasks", but the content on the platform - whether it be the competitive events, products, services, or even the various social interactions stemming from those things - can all be filtered by popularity, interests (meaning the games you've selected as interests of yours), and time.

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hello superwallet, if I understand your question correctly, you want to know if there is any synchronisation process between the games you want to play and our app. That is not necessary, as you are creating tournaments independent from the game in our app, and use it as a way to organize and chat with fellow gamers.  Quote from: termonator61 on December 01, 2017, 07:36:49 AM Hello. Are wallet of your platform and your platform account different applications, or is everything integrated into my account? Hello termonator61. Right now we have implemented the wallet into our application and it can be viewed by accessing your profile and then taping on the GGiD at the top right corner. You can also enter your wallet address, but it is still a work in progress at the moment.  Quote from: kobzar on December 01, 2017, 08:35:09 AM Hello. Will I be able to use my photo to model the face of my character, or will I have to adjust everything manually? Hello kobzar. At the moment this feature is not yet implemented, but we do appreciate the feedback, we will take this into consideration for future developmental updates.  Quote from: defender77 on December 01, 2017, 10:20:27 AM I'm wondering, will it matter what language I'm playing in, or am I talking about? For example, I would like to host tournaments only for players from my country. Hello defender77, right now our app is only in English. We do have plans for translating it as per our roadmap though. If you want to host for users who would only talk your language you could use your language in the tournament's title and description, as a way of attracting only users from your country. We will keep this in mind for future updates of the app, to make it more convenient.

Author: rancidgash
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: SAFT means "Simple Agreement for Future Token" and it means that through service SAFTLAUNCH  (https://www.saftlaunch.com) you can buy tokens. But to be allowed to buy tokens you have to register and pass KYC/AML checks.

Author: alexevt
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥

Author: alexevt
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥

Right now is second stage when anybody have chance to purchase tokens anonymously? Why this project has 2 stages and what is the benefit of first stage compared to second? Thank you so much for your help

Author: rancidgash
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Yep, correct. SAFT was first stage, and if I remember correctly investors had 20% bonus. Now (in second stage) for first 100 contributors is 15% bonus, for next 400 contributors is 10% bonus, and for rest is 7,5% bonus

Author: j.kerstein
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: An additional advantage of the SAFT stage is the additional comfort/transparency both investors and token issuers get from knowing the earliest (and usually largest) contributors won't dump the tokens right when they get the chance. Also, worth noting that the SAFT has a 20% discount, which is different than a bonus.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: If you want to contribute to the sale, you must pass KYC or your tokens will remain locked by our smart contract. If you want to buy anonymously you'll have to wait until GZR is on exchanges after the token sale.

Author: nothappend

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hello bit679, to answer your question, the service provider will take care of handling it. We act as a marketplace on which the trade will be made and act as an intermediary that guarantees safety for both parties involved, the seller and the buyer.  Quote from: MkrKing on November 30, 2017, 09:09:16 AM Hello. Will I be able to find my allies for the battle in ClashRoyale? I'm always texted by the same people on Twitter, but I don’t want to involve them, our clan needs fresh blood. Hello MkrKing, you can definitely find a lot of Clash Royale players on our platform. We have a userbase that ranges from new players to competitive players, and the community is growing every day.  Quote from: californybit on November 30, 2017, 09:15:27 AM Will your platform implement an opportunity to sign up for team tournaments alone? I just don’t want to miss tournaments while liking for someone. Hello californybit, I don't think I understand your question. There is definitely a difference between a team tournament and individual tournaments. If you don't have a team you wouldn't be able to participate in a team tournament, but would be able to participate in individual tournaments. However, there is definitely a possibility of finding new friends on the platform and being able to participate in those kind of tournaments as well.  Quote from: fgreg2692june on November 30, 2017, 01:49:35 PM I'm interested in what the promotion tournament looks like? Alas, I use the device running on Android, so I can’t test it myself.  Hello fgreg2692, you can actually test it yourself. The Android app has been released as per our roadmap a while ago and has been updated and improved many times, after the feedback we've constantly received from our community.  Quote from: expekto on November 30, 2017, 01:50:55 PM You're the best, guys But why do you need blockchain? We saw an opportunity to create a marketplace that can bring together all parties involved in the gaming industry and since it fits well into our mission and vision, blockchain is a step forward into creating a platform that can maximize the benefits for everyone involved.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: We'll support f2p, p2w and straight up paid games like CoD.  Quote from: bars_kz on November 27, 2017, 10:06:18 PM There are very often small tournaments held in Dota 2. Will it be possible to use your service to find a team?  Yes, we recently pushed an update with the first phase of our team module. Users can now create teams in the app. Next step will be implementing means of competing with your team, followed by unique team format brackets and then the ability to "scout" or find new teams for specific games like Dota.  Quote from: gazman on November 27, 2017, 08:03:14 PM Who might be interested in acquiring training in a mobile game? Did you conduct research on this aspect of your business?  There is a big market for coaching in many competitive mobile games. For example, in Clash Royale current market charges anywhere from $20-70 an hour for coaching via pro player. Nearly all deals are facilitated through channels like Twitter/Discord which makes them inefficient. We already have dozens of pro players signed up and interested in coaching, and the demand for them as Clash Royale gets more into eSports will only soar higher.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: We're not an advertising platform, what we would do is help to foster a competitive community for the developer through hosting sponsored tournaments and engage the brand with influencers.

Body: Hey Gizer community,  From now, you have a chance to review this ICO and earn crypto!  We value your opinion and are ready to reward you for it!  We’re now offering all users a chance to review upcoming ICOs on our platform for a chance to earn some crypto. This approach will be helpful for the project team, as they can hear some feedback from the audience   What you need to know: —The top 5 reviewers will receive rewards in ETH —1st place review is selected by ICObazaar (reward=0.1ETH) —2nd-5th place rewards are given to the reviews with the highest # of upvotes from other users (reward=0.4 ETH, split among the 4 winners proportionally according to # of upvotes) —Reviewing for upcoming ICOs is open up until the day the ICO launches.  Here’s how it works: 1. Register on icobazaar.com 2. Review an upcoming ICO on our platform — reviews are located on every ICO page under upcoming ICOs, here is Gizer page 3. Hopefully be one of the top 5 reviewers  See you there !

Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hello. We shifted the date a few days because of 2 reasons. Quote from: MuffinMaster on November 22, 2017, 03:42:13 PM Quote from: gizerfelix on November 22, 2017, 08:52:28 AM Quote from: DigiMig on November 22, 2017, 06:16:37 AM Can I know that how many ETH collected from the investors during the pre sale? Hello DigiMig.   The PreSale didn't start yet, if you want to check the time left until it starts you can check the countdown timer on our Tokensale website, it will take place on Friday. https://tokensale.gizer.io/  We are closer and closer to start presale, but i think that @DigiMig want ask how much ETH was collected till this moment..?  Can you reveal this information? If no - why?  Anyway in the moment of starting presale you have to tell in public how many tokens left.. Author: clartedscunner
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Check telegram pinned message  "Hey  The Presale officially begins Thursday, November 30th @ 14:00 UTC.  Two main reasons for this, it’s with your best interests in mind:  A) There has been overwhelming  demand that has led to the need to onboard several new temporary support staff over the weekend to give you 24/7 support during the TGE and assure a smooth KYC process. We’ve received a huge influx of signups and emails and we want to be able to take care of everyone promptly.  B) The price of ethereum has risen well over 100$ this week. We are going to need to adjust the price of GZR and our goal accordingly. We are hardcoding the price changes into the presale smart contract. Stay tuned for more updates.  It is incredibly important to us that all our community is taken care of and that we can offer you the best possible experience. When the timer hits 0 on https://tokensale.gizer.io you will be able to hit contribute and be taken to our contribution page (hosted on the same website).  THE CONTRACT ADDRESS WILL ONLY BE POSTED ON THE SITE ABOVE. WE WILL NEVER ASK YOU FOR YOUR WALLET IN DM OR ON TELEGRAM AND WE WILL NOT POST THE CONTRACT ADDRESS ANYWHERE ELSE. Gizer - The Global Gaming Network Gizer Tokensale ICO - The Global Gaming Network The GIZER SAFT is LIVE for accredited Investors. Gizer is a global network that connects gamers in real-time to create a more efficient eSports economy."

Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: From day 1, gamers can use GZR to redeem unique collectible profile items (which exist in limited quantities) to be equipped to the GGiD System. In the future these items will be tradeable as well and we're talking about implenting that directly into the marketplace within the platform.  There are many different types of items and different rarities. The lower of which (common/rare) can be unlocked with fiat/Boost and the more sought after, rarer items (Which will be based on the market interests and popular eSports titles/partnerships) will be unlockable only via GZR  That's just day 1 though, it was very important to us that GZR be usuable before we distribute it.  For Hosts and Services we have additional utility planned such as promoting events, featured search, promoting services or individual products. Sponsoring events/engaging with sponsors and other advertising features  Also, holding more GZR will afford different types of accolades that users otherwise couldnt get. These are meant to entice other users to further adopt.  We feel that these usecases combined with the fact that you dont need to know anything about Ethereum, or even hold ETH in order to make a GZR transaction on Gizer, is going to really encourage our community to adopt the token very early on. And as the network grows the demand for the token will increase with it  More people on the network demanding GZR will in turn cause the tokens value to go up

Author: marketone
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: So Gizer is mainly to the people who have interest towards gaming platforms. I also want to more about the Gizer because why it completely different from other platforms like Mobilego. Now a days we are seeing many platforms through blockchain like Rustbits, so what are the major benefits to the people by buying these tokens.

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: MobileGo have a totally different product, they trying to compete with Google and Apple. We aren't doing that, we aren't looking to compete, we are looking to create something new. The gaming community doesn't have a network where all participants, from hosts and gamers to freelancers and businesses can interact.  We want to bridge the gap that exists in this fast-growing industry.  Regarding the benefit of the coin for anyone who owns it, as mentioned in my last post, is that the more people on the network, the more the value of the tokens will increase. With everything that we're doing and the response we're receiving from the community, we are confident that our project will grow at the same pace with the Gaming and eSports industry.

Author: czukor
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: The project isn't mainly for professional players. The project is unlike many other esports gambling and wagering platforms. We are focused on the mobile sector and provide infrastructure to network, monetize your skill/service, and use events and social channels as a means to foster community engagement.

Body: must say i agree with the conclusion in here: https://bitcoinexchangeguide.com/gizer/  The Gizer platform seems to have many of the tools that gamers are looking for these days. There are many other communication platforms specifically designed to connect players together, but none of them have as many different tools as Gizer does. Every gamer has a mobile device, and the fact that this platform is designed for your phone is a fantastic opportunity to eliminate the need to ALT+TAB to report tournament wins or losses, meaning that you won’t have to leave your game just to get in touch. There is true potential here, and all we need is proper marketing and a few investors.

Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Yes, pretty much everything is automated, easy and straightforward. At the same time there are many different variables that can be customized, as the name of the event, the image of the event, the location if there's any, adding a stream channel url, a website as well as having exact hour of the event and many other features.  Most of the events right now are created by our community. We do, however, help incentivize the community by creating some special events like the $50 Bazoo Blast event a couple of days ago.  Quote from: gliridian on October 30, 2017, 11:30:05 AM    I think this is a plus points to Gizer. But of course, the color, UX/UI design and the lightweightness of the app are also important. But having a working product already gave Gizer a plus points for me. We are listening to our community. And then we have Gizer. Gizer claimed that they will make their platform/network the truly Global Gaming Network. Where everyone, gamers, developers, enthusiasts, fans, businemen and investors gather together to create their own vision of their game. I wonder on the viability of this concept. Is this really possible? I'm not much of a gamer, but I used to play Final Fantasy and other arcade games. This concept is great, but I don't know if this will work. There are so many unforeseen variables that are in play. However, I haven't completely read the whitepaper so I'll still study it. But so far that's how I understand it.

Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: The ecosystem of e-sport, while complex, has the advantage of presenting a wide range of actors with whom it is possible to collaborate. Actors offering different levels of production (amateur, semi-pro or professional with larger means) or audience. A range of solutions to meet the different expectations of a brand, both in terms of objectives, or budget:   - sponsor a first-class VS team in the making   - invest in an international league VS a national line   - organize a tournament for pro VS gamers for amateurs   - to embark on an event approach VS a 100% online approach   - a special operation with a major webTV VS a webTV to the community more measured   - choose a game already well structured on the esport scene VS a new entrant   - achieve endorsement with a high-profile gamer VS sponsor a gamer promising   - sponsor a TV show VS a specialized website   - brand content device in the long term VS brand content punctual

Author: jasong

Author: BTCGOLD
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: What we changed is that we had originally planned to do a $1M presale (where our smart contract would generate tokens) on October 20th. However, we took in more than our goal through the SAFT, and we decided to implement new tech into our smart contract that would allow users to transfer GZR without paying gas in ETH. Because of these two reasons we decided to push back the public presale and token generation event to November 10th, bonuses will be given to the first 500 contributors (15% to the first 100 and 10% to the next 400). The ICO itself will commence shortly after the presale and it will officially close when the $18M hard cap is met, or on December 20th. Whichever comes first. We are updating our whitepaper, ANN thread and other posts to reflect the new changes, and to announce the new advisors we have brought onto the team like David Drake, James Sowers, Kevin Monserrat, Count Erik Wachtmeiser and other amazing entrepreneurs.  Hope this answers your question fully, let me know if anything is unclear.

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Yes, we want full trust from our community because too many ICO's nowadays have made this field look very shady. We don't offer just an idea, we offer a real product and a vision which we have put up for everyone to see and take part in. We will change the eSports industry together.  Quote from: trollercoaster on October 17, 2017, 02:43:16 PM As I understand, this project is some kind of sponsor of gamers. 18 million dollar cap is not too much actually. But game projects usually cannot make a good run in market.  There's no need for more than what is necessary at this stage to grow and reach a higher number of gamers around the world. The industry is big and it's only going to expand, but many projects are very one dimensional, Gizer is looking to offer value to the whole gaming ecosystem, fueling the eSports economy as a whole.

Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hello matjas, we let our community create most of the tournaments because first of all we want to solve their problems. Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Click here to find out how to prepare for the GZR Presale  Hey guys, we've published a guide on how to prepare yourself for the GZR presale next week. The guide goes over ERC20 compatible wallets, how to register and do KYC and how to sign up for our whitelist. Make sure that you do this at least 48h before the presale if you want a chance. The hard cap is $1m and will come be first-come-first-served from the whitelist. If the presale does not fill up from the whitelist, then we will open to the presale to the rest of the public. Be warned however, if you do not sign up in advance it is highly unlikely you will get a spot in the presale.  If you are an accredited investor looking to invest in USD, or you are a non-US resident and wish to contribute more than 10ETH, contact us directly (links on the doc) to use our Simple Agreement for Future Tokens to get a 20% bonus before October 20th.

Author: gizerfelix

Body: Of course, it was actually released before Android. Here is the link:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/gizer/id1165061479  Quote from: the_donald on October 14, 2017, 02:08:37 PM Quote from: cantdecide on October 14, 2017, 01:32:17 PM Quote from: Yasemin on October 14, 2017, 10:26:07 AM Quote from: SEELE^^01 on October 14, 2017, 07:15:29 AM would be nice to see a review video from gizer by a german youtuber or just in german. germany has a huge growing mobile gamer base. should be interesting for us too  I think 90% of German people speaks English, especially the gamers, am I correct? So must be no problem for them that the ICO reviews are in English I guess  Well, no. There are a lot who can't speak English even between gamers. That the reason why a lot of games get a german localization. Then there are also some who don't want to use English because it's too tiring for them to speak and listen to.  I am suprised every time how many people can't understand English in Germany.  you'd think more would know english nowadays, with the internet and all, but it seems like projects still need to appeal to the first language in some countries. We are aware of that and we are considering the international market. We don't want to leave out people who just don't know English good enough.  The whitepaper translated in German will be released soon as well and we already have in our roadmap the German App Localization set for December.

Author: FIEX
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: There is indeed no dividend in this project. If the token goes up and you sell at a higher price thats just profit .  Dividends is something completely different: a sum of money paid regularly (typically annually) by a company to its shareholders out of its profits (or reserves).

Author: bitcoinbulk

Body: One of the core value props of the platform is how it empowers event Hosts to create and manage their own tournaments. It's true that most AAA titles have competitive ecosystems, but that doesn't mean that Gizer can't be used to host a DOTA2 tournament. Our focus is on developing for mobile, however we're including support for desktop and console games and we hope to see the platform widely adopted in a cross platform manner in the future. What the previous poster wrote about services holds true as well, coaches and streamers can easily offer their services to gamers relating to any of the games on the platform. Body: I saw in this thread that someone asked how the token will be used on the Gizer platform;  ''What is the main usage of GZR ERC-20 tokens? First user case and the most important one is the Gizer Global Identity. This is the profile which is carried by user in every Gizer game. GZRs tokens can be exchanged for exclusive items for user profiles. 1 GZR will equal one randomly generated item. Later, they plan to add chests and you will be able to exchange them for , for instance, 5 GZRs and get a rare item with higher possibility. The project developers promise to continuously add utility to GZR tokens, but for now they are just exploring the legal limitations that impede their ability to add something else. They are also planning on creating Gizer market where GZRs tokens will be used additionally.''  Source; https://medium.com/@EthereumRussian/ico-review-of-gizer-gzr-esports-ethereum-platform-81f8e69240e7

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: That is actually a very important advantage we have. Creating a network at this stage is easier because anyone we get in contact with is able to see the drive everyone on the team has and how we're getting Gizer to the next level with each day that passes. There are more incoming messages for the team right now than there are outgoing, we're at a point where beside more and more Press interest, a higher number of people want to join us on our mission, as they can see the potential and don't want to miss out.  Quote from: dragonchopper9 on October 10, 2017, 08:57:56 PM Quote from: helloal on October 10, 2017, 08:48:57 PM Not sure if this has been posted already, but I just saw that Gizer has received a rating of 4.9 on ICObench (https://icobench.com/ico/gizer) which is a really impressive number.   Is this assessment relevant? Perhaps this service has the ability to give deliberately overestimated projections for a fee. They are using an algorithm which is also posted on their website. We didn't start with the highest rating immediately, so it may be said that this rating was earned by constant work on Gizer, with updates, answers and an increasing activity from both our community and ourselves. We are transparent and offer a lot of information to everyone so they can decide if they want to join. Much of the homework has already been done by the team, now it's all about action and with all the support everyone is giving, you can be sure there's nothing stopping this project from shooting for the stars.

Author: FIEX
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Just read a great extended review about this project. They have a nice verdict I would like to share:  The Verdict Projects that utilize the blockchain to tap into fast-growing markets are going to be viewed favorably by the investment world. They are also more likely to be solid opportunities for investors looking to participate in a high-flying startup.  That Gizer will hold a presale over the SAFT creates a strong value proposition for investors. I'm extremely bullish on SAFTs because they represent the best chance we have of creating a self-regulated cryptocurrency market. In its most basic form, a SAFT promises investors future tokens at a fixed price. But those tokens can be distributed either at launch or through inbuilt vesting strategies that encourage continued support over time.  From a fundamental perspective, Gizer is operating at the cutting edge of a fast-growth industry that is receiving lofty valuations. It remains to be seen whether it can capitalize on the opportunity.  They are very positive about Gizer! Gizer will be huge!

Author: gizerfelix
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: As far as the app goes, you will be using the in-app currency called Boost we have right now. If you download the app you can see that there are events where the entry is free and there is a prize in boost and there are also events where you need Boost to enter, which in many cases have higher prizes.  Quote from: magisterr on October 10, 2017, 01:45:53 PM You have any partnerships with some gaming company right now? Yes, we do have. We've already officially partnered up with IsCool Entertainment who are the creators of the competitive mobile eSport game Bazoo, among other titles and we have also other partnerships we cannot reveal just yet, but I can tell you one of them is very big in the eSports scene.  Quote from: Rigorous on October 10, 2017, 11:40:38 AM Quote from: cantdecide on October 10, 2017, 11:36:07 AM Quote from: jasong on October 10, 2017, 10:45:57 AM Boost was implemented specifically with mobile gamers in mind, users often find it akin to gems in Clash Royale. While in its current form it serves for only tournaments, it will also be used for purchasing GGID items, as well as other transactions where we will not be able to initially use GZR. If you take a look at our item distribution here: https://imgur.com/B71Q8v9 you'll notice that there are common, rare, legendary, insane and unfathomable items. Common items, as well as rare items, will also be purchasable with boost, whereas GZR items represent significantly more impactful, collectible and sought after items. We will transition over from the boost system to a blockchain based system which fully utilizes the potential of GZR down the line. This is the best move from a legal standpoint, but we also believe that it will help widespread adoption of GZR items as more players begin surfacing with the incredible items they unlock from GZR and many players will want to emulate this.  About the items you can get: What use do the avatars and items have in the platform? Is it just an avatar or can you do more with it and theses items?  I want to expand that question: Is it possible to cash your Boost balance out to fiat money or physical products? Or is it restricted to virtual items and services? Yes, Boost can be exchanged for gift cards right now and soon you will be able to cash out via Paypal. We will consider other type of cash outs at a later stage.  Quote from: Coin_trader on October 10, 2017, 03:34:12 PM Quote from: SEELE^^01 on October 10, 2017, 03:24:27 PM Quote from: matjas on October 10, 2017, 02:45:46 PM In your white paper you are mostly referring to mobile gaming community which i think its much easier to connect with Gizer, what about PC and console games? Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Boost was implemented specifically with mobile gamers in mind, users often find it akin to gems in Clash Royale. While in its current form it serves for only tournaments, it will also be used for purchasing GGID items, as well as other transactions where we will not be able to initially use GZR. If you take a look at our item distribution here: https://imgur.com/B71Q8v9 you'll notice that there are common, rare, legendary, insane and unfathomable items. Common items, as well as rare items, will also be purchasable with boost, whereas GZR items represent significantly more impactful, collectible and sought after items. We will transition over from the boost system to a blockchain based system which fully utilizes the potential of GZR down the line. This is the best move from a legal standpoint, but we also believe that it will help widespread adoption of GZR items as more players begin surfacing with the incredible items they unlock from GZR and many players will want to emulate this.

GZR is the ERC20. It's underlying value unlocks collectible, customizable profile items.  The blockchain based system you mention would be pegged to fiat, just like every other alt.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Boost can't be converted into GZR, but we're working on a few different ways to facilitate the in app purchasing of GZR, being a company based in the USA, we are extremely diligent with compliance and are exploring different options. Early adopters will send GZR from the presale and the sale can link their wallets to their GGID, they will be able to send GZR to a smart contract which will result in the unlocking of an item based on the pseudorandom encryption hash of the token that can be equipped to a users avatar. There are several strong options for us to increase mass adoption and a create a seamless user friendly experience and a lot of cool partnerships and integrations which can use to exchange GZR on Gizer; our team will talk about some of these options in our Medium blog post.This is a great issue to talk about, thank you for bringing it up!

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: It is important to understand the difference between Boost and GZR. Boost is the in app currency of Gizer. Boost can be used to facilitate different transacitons on the Gizer network and is tied to fiat currency. It is currently used to facilitate tournament prizes, pay entry fees and redeem cash rewards. GZR tokens represent an unlockable profile item tied to a users Global Gaming Identity. You won't able to buy and sell GZR on the app from day 1, but we have many plans to greatly increase the utility of the token. We'll talk about a bunch of these options, as well as the legal issues involved in one of our upcoming Medium posts, make sure to keep an eye out. Our team is committed to keeping everyone updated on exactly what our plans our regarding all aspect of GZR and the token sale! Since a lot of people are interested in this its a great thing for us to write a blog post on!

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: We are only accepting USD from Accredited investors through a Simple Agreement For Future Tokens which you can register for on https://saftlaunch.com.  We chose to only accept $1M for our presale because these funds will serve to aid in marketing the public sale in an extremely aggressive and viral manner in the time between the presale and the public sale. Our goal is not to ask for a huge amount of money "just because we can", we carefully calculated the presale and sale amount based on what we feel we need to achieve the business goals and vision we have for Gizer. We are extremely confident in our platform its accessibility, as well as the network effect through which both Gizer and the GZR token will grow. It is for that reason that our token is being offered at a fixed price for the sale, and that we are only offering these bonuses in the presale.  Quote from: wojteks102 on October 09, 2017, 10:44:47 PM I know that maybe here isn't a good place for questions like that but.. Is the Sylon only person responsible for bounty campaign?  You are correct Sylon is the manager of our Bounty Campaign

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Hey guys, Gabe here from Gizer. Going to do my best to answer every question I've seen in the thread, if I missed anyone call me out and I'll make sure to get to your question.     Tournaments: Gizer provides automated bracket technology that allows hosts to create, seed, score and manage brackets as well as tournaments which use the specific in game features of games like Clash Royale which have actual 'in game tournaments'. It also has strong location based services meant to facilitate local/live events as well!  Services: Gizer allows any gamer with a marketable skill like graphic design, coaching, casting, promoting, etc to turn those skills into paying gigs by listing them on the Gizer Marketplace . The Gizer Marketplace will be a PayPal Partnered Marketplace where businesses and individual service providers can list goods and sell them directly to gamers. Listings have ratings, comments, social links and more and in the future will be able to directly sponsor specific tournaments or hosts in order to further gain access to their target markets.  Quote from: Yasemin on October 09, 2017, 03:13:58 PM Quote from: jasong on September 23, 2017, 12:17:23 AM   MEDIUM ARTICLES YOU SHOULD READ:   How to Invest in the Gizer Flash Presale  Gizer Presale Details + Discount Structure   GIZER IS NOW AVAILABLE ON IOS AND ANDROID  Click Here to Download on iOS or Android (link is Universal and will direct you to the App Store/Google Play automatically based on your device)    The link you posted for the iOS and Android doesnt work. The working link is easly found on the website tho https://tokensale.gizer.io/     Thanks for pointing this out, I have fixed the link. It is now working.  Quote from: viljy on October 09, 2017, 03:16:09 PM What is different about GIZER from the Google Play Games app? Or differences from Steam? Interested in the difference in functionality. I see that in GIZER there will be a chat, creation or search team, tournaments, but how the tokens will be used is not understand. Will the game items be sold? Or what small business is meant? Unfortunately there is no application for Android, where most of the players on the mobile platform are playing.  Here is the link to Android taken from the OP: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=gizer.com.android  From day 1, tokens will be used to unlock unique and randomized profile items which can be attached to a users Global Gaming Identity. The GGID is a universal profile which tracks the statistics of players as they compete in various games across the Gizer Network and all it's integrations. Gamers are competitive in nature, and are passionate about showing off their profiles as they compete, strong examples of this can be seen in hundreds of games across the globe like Path of Exile, DOTA2, CS:GO and many more. We have even more utility for the token planned as we progress, and as the legislation surrounding tokens becomes clearer. Some additional functions we are preparing for include paying fees on the network, using multiple tokens for increased chances at higher rarity items, tokenizing the items themselves and hosting them on the blockchain to achieve true ownership and marketability and facilitating multiple transactions through the network itself including on the services marketplace and the gaming feed.  Quote from: kraterion on October 09, 2017, 05:52:31 PM There's no mobile gaming platform like Steam (for desktops). Do you want to cover this issue with Gizer? I'm going to download the app.  Gizer is meant to connect all the members of the gaming community to fuel the competitive eSports economy. It resembles Steam in terms of networking, chatting, but it is not meant to be a store where you can purchase actual mobile games.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Check out my answer above for some more information on this.  Quote from: jasong on October 09, 2017, 06:14:36 PM   Here is the link to Android taken from the OP: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=gizer.com.android  From day 1, tokens will be used to unlock unique and randomized profile items which can be attached to a users Global Gaming Identity. The GGID is a universal profile which tracks the statistics of players as they compete in various games across the Gizer Network and all it's integrations. Gamers are competitive in nature, and are passionate about showing off their profiles as they compete, strong examples of this can be seen in hundreds of games across the globe like Path of Exile, DOTA2, CS:GO and many more. We have even more utility for the token planned as we progress, and as the legislation surrounding tokens becomes clearer. Some additional functions we are preparing for include paying fees on the network, using multiple tokens for increased chances at higher rarity items, tokenizing the items themselves and hosting them on the blockchain to achieve true ownership and marketability and facilitating multiple transactions through the network itself including on the services marketplace and the gaming feed.  Gizer is meant to connect all the members of the gaming community to fuel the competitive eSports economy. It resembles Steam in terms of networking, chatting, but it is not meant to be a store where you can purchase actual mobile games.  Quote from: tiger5056 on October 09, 2017, 12:43:20 PM so from reading announcement , token is going to used for purchase extra items for games and specialized items for games. what types of games going to be available?  Here are just a few of the games that will be supported on the Gizer Network: https://imgur.com/Gv86f2F  To clarify though, GZR will not be used to purchase in game items like CS:GO skins, the GGID items will be served through the Gizer network and the GGID itself will represent an eSports fan as they compete in various games and watch live or online events, following them on their eSports journey. Items will be unique and customized, and we will create more and more partnerships with top eSports brands and game developers to create more and more desirable items for Gamers. We see further gamification of this system through advances in AR/VR. In our vision, Gamers can take their GGID Avatars with them to live events, compete with other Gamers, and earn achievements not only for competing, but watching and participating in all sorts of different eSports events and activities.   Quote from: Mystic90 on October 09, 2017, 02:16:05 PM Interesting ICO, i have to do some research on how this is different from MobileGo or Gamecredits to see if the value for GIZER higher is or not. Def caught my attention !  To start, our product is already developed and growing every day, and our platform is meant to fuel the entire eSports economy by connecting gamers, hosts, services, businesses and venues all together as opposed to the platforms you mentioned which are more targeted towards developer monetization, app store downloads, and the specific relationship between Gamers and Developers. While we are already partnering with mobile game developers to create more competitive offerings, and will surely aid eSports enthusiasts in discovering new and exciting competitive games, Gizer is by no means "an app store"

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Quote from: the_donald on October 09, 2017, 07:04:48 PM    so there will be another currency on the Gizer network. pegged to fiat? how much is a token's worth of boost?  I'm going to answer both of these at the same time since they are quite similar.  Boost is our in app currency, it is used to enter tournaments and is won from tournaments. Boost can be used to redeem rewards which currently are in the form of gift cards to all major platforms, and will soon include direct paypal rewards as well. 1 Boost won = 1 dollar. Boost is not an ERC20 token, and it is not currently related to GZR. In the future we hope to see a cross over between the two, and eventually we would like to see GZR become a universally accepted currency on the platform. However, there exist many legislative restrictions which hold us back from allowing it be used to compete, or allowing us to sell GZR directly to you from within the app. Our legal and technical teams are working diligently to find a solution to this and we are exploring many different ways that we can facilitate this kind of thing in the future.  As for Services, the services marketplace will be payable in several different fiat currencies through fiat. We are currently exploring partnerships with several different companies to facilitate purchases through various cryptopayment methods. This is definitely something you will see on Gizer in the future!  The strongest case for Boost at the moment is prize pools for tournaments. Boost can be purchased by hosts to offer prizes for the tournaments they are hosting

Author: czukor
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Gizer is infrastructure for the gaming/esports space. It allows users to provide/offer their skills and resources to the community. Whether it's selling product, providing freelancing services, participating in events, listing live event space etc. Gizer provides underlying infrastructure to support economic interactions in an event centric manner.  Below is a breakdown of what each user type wants:  Host Perspective: Wants people to attend the event Wants to partner with sponsors Wants to see available services Wants to manage/update his event Wants to easily notify attendees about event updates Wants to see who is interested in his/her event Wants to network Wants to share experiences Wants to accept user sign ups/ $ Wants to be able to answer questions Wants to be able to manage a contact list Wants to easily message users Wants to share his/her event with established friends Wants to differentiate from local competition  Gamer Perspective: Wants to know about nearby events of his interest Wants to know events going on near him/her Wants to be able search for his interests Wants to be able to create a “quick game/quick event” Wants to network Wants to share experiences Wants to be able to manage a contact list Wants to easily message users Wants to share event with established friends Wants to be able ask host questions Wants to know all details about event Wants to know who else is participating in events  Service Perspective: Wants to talk to hosts Wants to sell their service to users and hosts Wants to talk to sponsors Wants to have ability to act as a freelancer and promote his service/talent Wants to network Wants to share experiences Wants to be able to manage a contact list Wants to easily message users Wants to increase his/her sales visibility over time Wants to differentiate from local competition  Venue Perspective: Wants to talk to hosts Wants to sell their service to users and hosts Wants to talk to sponsors Want to have ability to network Wants to differentiate from local competition Wants to be able to manage a contact list Wants to increase his/her sales visibility over time    Here's our latest post about scaling Gizer.  https://medium.com/@Gizer_Gaming/gizer-platform-scalability-3c2fd7597058

Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥

Also, there are several posts about an advisor who was helping with general blockchain theory advisory and is not involved in the project in major way. Yet, we have trolls on here posting in large lettering to try to hijack our thread. We're an NYC-based company with an innovative existing product. We've done our due diligence with ensuring our token is indeed not a security, which is a nice assurance to have for business sustainability and continuity.

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: If you are an accredited investor, you can participate before October 20th. The 20% bonus is only available to accredited investors who participate through the SAFT. However, the PUBLIC presale will begin on October 20th, and this will not contain a 20% bonus but instead will have a tiered bonus system.  You will still need to register on SAFT Launch for the public presale because we require that all investors go through KYC. A link to our whitelist form is available in the medium link provided by czukor above.  Hope this addresses some questions I have seen in the thread. If you want to know anything else, don't hesitate to ask!

Author: jasong
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: We recently pushed a new update for our iOS app, solving several bugs and implementing a referral system for users to earn boost through sharing. Our Android closed beta has wrapped up, and we are optimizing the app now for publishing on Google Play. We're working on fixing the last crashes on certain devices so that we can publish. Our goal is to have the Android app live and publicly accessible before the start of next week. We'll post on medium, send out an email to our newsletter subscribers and post here when Android is available for everyone to try out! In regards to the sale, the 20% SAFT bonus for accredited investors is still open, you can read more about the public presale, and find our whitelist form in our most recent medium post here  https://medium.com/@Gizer_Gaming/how-to-invest-in-gizers-flash-presale-2948e462e9d  If there's anything you want to know, don't hesitate to ask. Fastest way to reach us is by joining our Telegram group, but we do our best to monitor all of our channels and keep our supporters up to date!

Author: clartedscunner
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Gizer Makes Headlines in ICO Community Ahead of Public Sale / Gizer Tops ICOBench Ranking Ahead of Public Sale  The Gizer gaming platform captured the No. 1 spot on ICOBench.com this week, as investors look ahead with anticipation to next month’s token sale.  Gizer’s score, https://icobench.com/ico/gizer on ICO Bench shot up to 4.9 out of 5, easily tops in the Entertainment and Platform categories. The ICO Bench algorithm is clearly picking up on the company’s momentum ahead of the Oct. 20 public crowdsale. Gizer’s presale is currently open using a Simple Agreement for Future Tokens (SAFT), which is the most secure crowdfunding model available. The presale is backed by New York-based SAFTLaunch, a platform that connects investors with vetted token sales.  ICO Bench rates initial coin offerings through a special algorithm that weighs more than 20 criteria. The methodology, which was developed by independent experts, allocates a score out of 5 based on team, product, business strategy and resilience. ICO scores are dynamic, which means they are subject to change based on new information captured by the algorithm.  The Gizer ICO will raise $18 million through a combined SAFT presale and public crowdsale. A total of 100 million tokens will be issued, each valued at 0.27 USD. The Gizer token, also known as GZR, leverages the latest advances in blockchain technology for seamless integration across multiple gaming platforms.    Gizer is a real-time global gaming network that connects gamers, hosts, services, venues and businesses. It provides the gaming community the opportunity to connect through tournament hosting, service and product listings and brand sponsorships all found directly on the platform.  GZR is an ERC20 token created on the public Ethereum blockchain, which is the world’s No. 2 cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Ethereum is up more than 3,000% this year thanks to features like smart contracts, are blockchain applications for contract negotiation and facilitation.  The GZR token essentially represents a profile that can be unlocked only by attaching to a user’s wallet, also known as the Gizer Global Identity. When a token is unlocked, it creates a randomized profile that is applied to the gamer’s avatar. By unlocking more tokens, users gain prestige within the gaming community and are rewarded exclusive items, rank boosts and badges.  Unlocked tokens are sent from the user’s wallet to the Gizer project for further reuse. GZR tokens can also be used to pay commissions or other fees on the platform.  The growth and widespread adoption of mobile gaming makes Gizer a timely addition to the global eSports economy. It represents the first viable network that links the billion-strong mobile gaming community to the eSports phenomenon. Its economic footprint extends far beyond gamers themselves to include hosts, small businesses, freelancers and other venues.  To learn more about Gizer, visit https://gizer.io/

Author: Sylon
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Note: I am making this Original Post for Gizer. I am not the point of contact. Please contact Jasong, Czukor or Reactiv3 for any questions.          | WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | GITHUB | TWITTER | TELEGRAM |     THE GLOBAL GAMING NETWORK  Creating Opportunity in the Gaming Economy  Gizer is a peer-to-peer network, driven by interactions between different parties to create economic opportunity in the global gaming community. Our vision is to create opportunity for all members of the global gaming economy. The Gizer network will connect gamers, hosts, small businesses, freelancing services, and venues to create a more productive gaming world.  Private Sale (20% Discount): October 20th, 2017 until the start of the ICO. Accredited Investors only through SAFT Launch (link to https://saftlaunch.com)  ICO Begins: November 30th, 2017 13:00 UTC. 15% bonus for first 100 contributors 10% bonus for next 400 contributors Bonuses capped at $1M — Price fixed at 1000 GZR per ETH for the remainder of the ICO.   Bounty Campaign Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2210144    With over 1 billion mobile gamers, game developers have taken notice and are creating more competitive mobile games. Yet, there is no network to fuel the competitive gaming and eSports economy. Gizer is the solution…  Gizer is a peer-to-peer network, driven by interactions between different parties to create economic opportunity in the global gaming community. The Gizer network will connect gamers, hosts, small businesses, freelancing services, and venues to create opportunity for all members of the global gaming economy.   ICO details    Crowdsale Terms   Gizer’s presale is currently open using a Simple Agreement for Future Tokens (SAFT). Contact support@gizer.io for information about the SAFT discount. The public presale will open on October 20.   * Note: The 15,000,000 GZR held in reserve will also serve as an incentive plan for adoption. Gizer is also working with game developers for item licensing agreements.   What is GZR?  GZR represents an unlockable profile item in an “unknown” state. The user can unlock tokens at any time, resulting in a randomized profile item being unlocked that can be applied to a gamer’s avatar. The rarity and type of the item unlocked is completely random and decided only after the user decides to unlock it.Users can collect items to rank up and customize their avatars to gain prestige within the gaming community. Once certain sets of items are collected, the user is rewarded with exclusive items, rank boosts, and badges specific to their accolades.    Users who have linked an Ethereum account to their Gizer profile will be able to redeem GZR tokens and exchange them for Gizer profile items. They will do this simply by sending GZR tokens from their Ethereum wallet to a “Gizer redemption account”. Gizer will monitor that account in near real-time for incoming GZR tokens. When an incoming token transfer is confirmed, Gizer will look up the Gizer profile that corresponds to the sending Ethereum wallet. Based on the pseudo-random transaction hash of the token transfer, Gizer items will be added to the Gizer user’s profile. These Gizer items will be assigned a unique hash on the Gizer backend, which can be unlocked by the user at any time, or transferred to another user.   Bounties  Our early adopters and the community at large are extremely important to us. In order to thank those who are supporting our platform and our crowdsale - we will be offering a bounty campaign for all to participate in.  More information about the bounty program can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2210144   GZR Roadmap  You can find a more detailed roadmap at https://tokensale.gizer.io   Q1 Gizer mobile app developed for iOS and Android Pre-ICO Marketing begins Smart Contract Audited GG ID Developed Public Token Sale Collection of GZR Items released  Q2 Gizer store is developed GG ID Public API is made available for third party integrations with game developers Direct GG ID Integration with mobile eSports game Bazoo More GZR Items are released Development of Gizer web platform using REACT Native  Q3 Gizer News is launched Gizer Marketplace updated to new Blockchain technologies APAC Marketing Campaign          If you have any questions we will be monitoring this thread as well as all of our social media accounts listed below. We encourage you to ask questions and discuss or give your feedback on Gizer.  Bitcointalk handles of team members Jasong Czukor Reactiv3       Thank you for reading!   Social Media and Important Links  TOKENSALE WEBSITE https://tokensale.gizer.io  WEBSITE https://gizer.io  FACEBOOK https://www.facebook.com/GizerGaming/  TWITTER https://twitter.com/Gizer_Gaming  MEDIUM https://medium.com/@Gizer_Gaming  REDDIT https://www.reddit.com/r/Gizer/  GITHUB https://github.com/GizerInc  TELEGRAM https://t.me/joinchat/Em71dQ4KZ8G-XxpArXNuHg  INSTAGRAM https://www.instagram.com/gizer_gaming/  TWITCH https://www.twitch.tv/gizertv  YOUTUBE https://www.youtube.com/c/GizerGaming

Author: czukor
Title: 🌟[ANN][ICO]🌟 GIZER - The Global Gaming Network 🌐 ► ICO 30th Nov. 🔥
Body: Thank you Sylon for making the post!  I'm the Gizer ceo and will be posting updates on this account.  Here's a quick summary of where we stand:  We have a very innovative team and we're doing things quite differently than some existing esport/gaming applications. Several small esport/gaming startups have raised in the 7-10m range from institutional $ over the past few months. Like most others, we're super bullish on the growth of esports. We believe esports is in its adolescence and mobile esports is truly in its infancy. As the highest level of esports grows in popularity, the demand to reach that level grows in tandem. At Gizer, we're building the infrastructure to support the esports economy at the general/amateur level.   The gamer demographic is typically technologically adept. They not only have gaming skills but editing, hosting, design, coaching, promoting, and moderating skills. There is a space on Gizer for gamers to play and offer their craft to the community. Small business has a place in the Gizer ecosystem as well- they can sponsor events to advertise their service/product to the perfect audience. Gizer currently also offers location-based services (optional of course) if hosts or venues want to have a live event. Gizer will be an effective medium to host a physical event...unless you want to rely on getting a facebook event invite ha!  We will have an update on the Android beta release soon. We have a few thousand users on our ios app. Unfortunately, Apple is giving us some trouble with our latest update (regarding payout) and it's causing a lot of trouble on ios11 . We're getting this resolved asap.  We have a very clear vision on where we're heading and we appreciate the support so far!
